general.Configure font, formatting, minimap and: Configure font, formatting, minimap and more
general.Import settings, extensions, and keybind: Import settings, extensions, and keybindings from VS Code
general.See warnings and tips that you've hidden: See warnings and tips that you've hidden
general.Prevent the use of codebase, prompts, an: Prevent the use of codebase, prompts, and telemetry to improve Cursor. This is a machine-level setting, not account-level. Learn more.

applying_changes.Allow Agent to edit files outside of the: Allow Agent to edit files outside of the selected context in Manual Mode
applying_changes.Automatically fix lint errors in the cha: Automatically fix lint errors in the chat
applying_changes.Automatically accept all changes when fi: Automatically accept all changes when files are committed and no longer in the worktree
applying_changes.Allow Agent to run tools like command ex: Allow Agent to run tools like command execution and file writes without asking for confirmation

inline_editing_terminal.Show Add to Chat & Edit buttons when sel: Show Add to Chat & Edit buttons when selecting code
inline_editing_terminal.Automatically parse links when pasted in: Automatically parse links when pasted into Quick Edit (⌘K) input
inline_editing_terminal.Auto-Select Code Regions for Quick Edit: Auto-Select Code Regions for Quick Edit (⌘K)
inline_editing_terminal.Automatically select regions for inline: Automatically select regions for inline code editing
inline_editing_terminal.Use themed background colors for inline: Use themed background colors for inline code diffs
inline_editing_terminal.Use character-level diffs for inline cod: Use character-level diffs for inline code diffs
inline_editing_terminal.Show tooltips like \"Add to chat\" in th: Show tooltips like "Add to chat" in the terminal
inline_editing_terminal.Show a hint for ⌘K in the Terminal: Show a hint for ⌘K in the Terminal
inline_editing_terminal.Use a preview box instead of streaming r: Use a preview box instead of streaming responses directly into the shell

chat.Adjust the text size of Chat messages: Adjust the text size of Chat messages
chat.After periods of inactivity, open the Ch: After periods of inactivity, open the Chat Pane to a new chat
chat.Play a sound when Agent finishes respond: Play a sound when Agent finishes responding
chat.Create custom modes with specific models: Create custom modes with specific models, tools, keybindings, and instructions tailored to your workflow
chat.Allow full contents of the selected fold: Allow full contents of the selected folder to be included in the context
chat.Include a simplified directory tree as c: Include a simplified directory tree as context
chat.Allow Agent to search the web for releva: Allow Agent to search the web for relevant information
chat.Apply .cursorignore rules to all subdire: Apply .cursorignore rules to all subdirectories. Changing this setting will require a restart of Cursor.
chat.Remove the last context pill in the comp: Remove the last context pill in the composer when pressing backspace at the start of the input

tab.Context-aware, multi-line suggestions ar: Context-aware, multi-line suggestions around your cursor based on recent edits
tab.Accept the next word of a suggestion via: Accept the next word of a suggestion via ⌥→
tab.Allow Tab to trigger while in a comment: Allow Tab to trigger while in a comment region
tab.Suggest edits like new lines and indenta: Suggest edits like new lines and indentation that modify whitespace only
tab.Automatically import necessary modules f: Automatically import necessary modules for TypeScript
tab.Enable auto import for Python. This is a: Enable auto import for Python. This is a beta feature.

models.Get maximum context window and tool call: Get maximum context window and tool calls. For advanced users that are cost insensitive.

api_keys.Change the base URL for OpenAI API reque: Change the base URL for OpenAI API requests.
api_keys.Configure Azure OpenAI to use OpenAI mod: Configure Azure OpenAI to use OpenAI models through your Azure account.
api_keys.Configure AWS Bedrock to use Anthropic C: Configure AWS Bedrock to use Anthropic Claude models through your AWS account. Certain Enterprise teams can configure IAM roles to access Bedrock, without any Access Keys.

rules.Learn your preferences automatically bas: Learn your preferences automatically based on Chat
rules.Manage your custom user rules and prefer: Manage your custom user rules and preferences
rules.Help Agent understand conventions in thi: Help Agent understand conventions in this project directory
rules.If off, we will not include the .cursorr: If off, we will not include the .cursorrules file in your requests
rules.Create rules specific to this project: Create rules specific to this project

indexing_docs.Embed codebase for improved contextual u: Embed codebase for improved contextual understanding and knowledge.
indexing_docs.Embeddings and metadata are stored in th: Embeddings and metadata are stored in the cloud, but all code is stored locally.
indexing_docs.Automatically index any new folders with: Automatically index any new folders with fewer than 50,000 files
indexing_docs.Files to exclude from indexing in additi: Files to exclude from indexing in addition to .gitignore. View included files.
indexing_docs.Crawl and index custom resources and dev: Crawl and index custom resources and developer docs
indexing_docs.Add documentation to use as context. You: Add documentation to use as context. You can also use @add in Chat to add a doc.

background_agents.Run agents in the cloud, in beta preview: Run agents in the cloud, in beta preview.
background_agents.Configure environment settings and secre: Configure environment settings and secrets for background agents

mcp_tools.Add a custom MCP tool here or configure: Add a custom MCP tool here or configure project-specific tools in <project-root>/.cursor/mcp.json

network.HTTP/2 is recommended for low-latency st: HTTP/2 is recommended for low-latency streaming. In some corporate proxy and VPN environments, the compatibility mode may need to be lowered.
network.Check network connectivity to backend AI: Check network connectivity to backend AI services

beta.By default, get notifications for stable: By default, get notifications for stable updates. In Early Access, pre-release builds may be unstable for production work.
beta.Capture project notes to automatically i: Capture project notes to automatically include in Chat context
